      • getDegreesWithinOctave

        public int[] getDegreesWithinOctave()
        Omit the last interval. So, for major return c d e f g a b and not c d e f b a b c6
        Returns:
        the degrees without the root at the end

      • setKeySignature

        public void setKeySignature(KeySignature keySignature)
        Works only if the Scale's name is "Major" or "Minor". Throws an IllegalArgumentException if not.

        Also sets this.key.

        Parameters:
        keySignature - the key signature
